game.name: Elsa Wedding Design
game.description:
Elsa is in love with the handsome Jack Frost. They both have decided to get married today. The hearts of this cute couple is full of happiness and love, but they both seem to be confused what to put on to look fabulous on their special day.  Not only this, they are also seeking the ways how to make their wedding room look worth visiting. Do you come forward to help them out? Join Elsa Wedding Design and be prepared to take up the charge of a fashion and decoration stylist! 
You would have two important tasks including decorating room and dressing them up to complete. Put your best fashion abilities to create her dream wedding outfit in this brand new dressing game for girls! Firstly, decorate the room with the options including table and chair set up, carpet and front side design and lightings. Make sure to change the stage outlook and the side window design to make the room look more festive in this one of the best html5 dress up games. In the next step, you have to dress up Elsa with the elegant outfit and accessory options you see on the right side of the screen. 
Give her a white color gown or a cream color dress with flower design or an elegant red color flower-enriched outfit! Choose a nice hairstyle, bride scarf, a bouquet of lovely flowers, as well as matching jewelries and a pair of suitable sandals in this princess dress up game! Get ready to prepare an awesome outfit for the handsome Jack Frost! All the best to dress them up in a way they deserve for! Enjoy more wedding games on atmegame.com, no download required.
game.metaTitle: Elsa Wedding Design, Dressing Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Elsa Wedding Design at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Dressing games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: Elsa Wedding Design Game, Girls Games, Dressing Game, Online Games, Play Free Games, Flash Games, Browser Game

game.webControlKeys: L-CLICK OF MOUSE TO SELECT THE ITEMS TO DECORATE THE ROOM  AND DRESSUP
